Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street, traveling north and south.
Room.LongDescription: You are in the primary shopping district. There are sets of buildings both to the east and west of Main Street. To the west, you can see Varga's Gold and Fine Jewelry Shop. There is an entrance to the large center in the east to the south. The shopping district seldom shuts down no matter what time of day it is.
